articles.author: Joe Otterson
articles.title: Larry David Sets HBO Return With American History Sketch Comedy Show - Variety
articles.description: Larry David and Jeff Schaffer have teamed with the Obamas for a sketch comedy show about American history at HBO, Variety has learned exclusively
articles.content:
At long last, Larry David is returning to HBO…again. 
Variety has learned exclusively that the “Curb Your Enthusiasm” creator and star has re-teamed with the premium cabler on a sketch comedy limite… [+3182 chars]

articles.title: UN says if US funding for HIV programs is not replaced, millions more will die by 2029 - AP News
articles.description: A new U.N. AIDS agency report says the sudden withdrawal of U.S. funding has caused a “systemic shock” to the global effort against AIDS and HIV. Years of American-led investment into AIDS programs has reduced the number of people killed by the disease to the…
articles.content: LONDON (AP) Years of American-led investment into AIDS programs has reduced the number of people killed by the disease to the lowest levels seen in more than three decades, and provided life-saving m… [+4944 chars]

articles.author: Elizabeth Cooney
articles.title: Nearly 1 in 3 teens have prediabetes, CDC finds, in ‘wake-up call’ - STAT
articles.description: Nearly 1 in 3 American adolescents have prediabetes, a CDC report finds. An official notes "it’s not too late to change course."
articles.content: About 1 in 3 young people who are 12 to 17 years old have prediabetes, new national data show, putting them at risk not just for type 2 diabetes but also for heart disease and stroke. Developing chro… [+6568 chars]
